name: Clues | A Playable Prologue
description:
:

Clues is about a farmer who went missing after people heard some mysterious noises coming out of his barn. The "game" is a 2-3 minute long playable prologue which I created for my studies. It's rather a concept than a full game experience. As a detective who is inspecting the scene, you're goal is to find 3 objects in the level.

No installation needed.

Homepage: https://connor.gallery/home

View project on Artstaion: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/v2AKX3

Sound effects obtained from: https://www.zapsplat.com

Know issues:

●  Texture pops in sometimes

The game was tested on two windows PCs, please let me know if you have any major issues.

If you like the game, feel free to share it :)
